name: Sashimi Slammers
description:
It's the one and only certain fish fighting game, Sashimi Slammers!

A game were fish who are destined to die duke it out to see who is more honorable.

For the full experience contact Zac at zmackerel.boi@gmail.com to try the game with the legendary fish controllers.

Be sure to follow or rarely updated dev blog at https://fishbois.blogspot.com/
